front.title: Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) Internet Gateway Device (IGD)-Port Control Protocol (PCP) Interworking Function

abstract.t: This document specifies the behavior of the UPnP IGD (InternetGateway Device)/PCP Interworking Function. An UPnP IGD-PCPInterworking Function (IGD-PCP IWF) is required to be embedded in CProuters to allow for transparent NAT control in environments whereUPnP is used in the LAN side and PCP in the external side of the CProuter.
